mapper.update:
update userinfo
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userage = #{userage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update userinfo set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userage = #{userage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usertel = #{usertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userrole = #{userrole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdtime = #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatedtime = #{updatedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addition1 = #{addition1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addition2 = #{addition2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addition3 = #{addition3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
